column1: Smoque BBQ////Only complaint was the worker didn't know if the cornbread was sweet (made with sugar)
column2: I should have ordered it to find out. Brisket was amazing. Sausage was a single link for $4.50
column3: was ok flavor. Great thick sauce. Would definitely come back. BBQ beans are pretty tangy
column4: not my preference but still good. This is a fast casual restaurant
column5: but the service was really good.
